comments.content: I can see a need for the X-Narrow in my library, but not the narrow. Glad that it happened though!

I love the Narrow! Think it's nicer than the original.

I haven't worked out how much all 66 cost.

... I have now! I'll have to start saving.

<cite> The prospect of a "Gotham for embroidery" collection and a "Gotham for box scores" was daunting, and ran counter to one of H&FJ's core philosophies: that type families should be as small as possible, but as large as necessary.</cite>

Is 66 really as small as possible?
